segments.text: Hi , Mr . Smith . I ’ m Dr . Hawkins . Why are you here today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought it would be a good idea to get a check-up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , well you haven ’ t had one for ... five years . You should have one every year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I figure as long as there ’ s nothing wrong , why go see the doctor ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the best way to avoid serious illnesses is to find out about them early . So , try to come at least once a year for your own good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see here . Your eyes and ears look fine . Take a deep breath , please . Do you smoke , Mr . Smith ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Smoking is the leading cause of lung cancer and heart disease , you know . You really should quit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve tried a hundred times , but I just can ’ t seem to kick the habit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we have classes and some medications that might help . I ’ ll give you more information before you leave .
segments.speaker: S1
